/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with tall apartment buildings, their windows reflecting the clear blue sky. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. A bridge arches over the street, connecting different parts of the city. Trees and streetlights punctuate the view, providing a sense of order amidst the urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a city that is both vibrant and serene.
